name: Player Alone Battlegrounds
description:
Single Player Battle Royale ?!

Yes! We did it!

The real battle is the inner battle.

Game made for LD41, the theme was "Combine 2 incompatible genres"

Instructions:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse To Look
  • Mouse Click to Fire
  • F for interactions
  • Space to jump

developed with Maya, GoogleBlocks, Mixamo and Unity3D, by

Gustavo “Mut” Guimaraes - Programming

Fabio Senna - Art

Rodrigo Koshino - Art

Note: The game was built for a 16:9 resolution, so anything other than that might not be optimal.

For the Post Jam build just some minor bug fixes.
